item.title: I'm now on Dribbble!
item.description: It’s been a couple of days since I’ve started out on Dribbble, and I must say, it’s been an exciting experience. It’s incredible to see so much creativity, ideas, mockups, everything-cool-about-design all in one place. Seeing everyone’s work, I decided I needed something to show for as well; hence, I began making mini-projects. I’ve made two so far, really proud of how they’ve come out! Neon Blue Login/Sign-Up Zomato — Dark Theme Revamp Check them out on my Dribbble here !

item.title: I've Started Learning Figma
item.description: The more I’ve been exploring the world of design, the more I’ve realized the immense power of Figma. Naturally, I had to get my hands dirty right away. I play around with Adobe Ps and Ai quite often, so it didn’t take too much time to get going with Figma. I was immediately amazed by the brilliant workflow, tools, and simply the experience of using it. I watched a few YouTube videos to understand how things work.

item.title: I Took a Foundations of UX Design Course — Here's What I Learnt
item.description: I’ve always been a huge fan of design. The moment I got some free time, I made sure to make the most out of it — I took this course on Coursera and wrote down what I found most important so as to document my learnings as well as, maybe, pass it on =) Here’s what I learnt. What is UX? UX stands for User Experience. It is how a user feels about interacting with or experiencing a product.

item.title: I Built a Website (Clearly)
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my website! This website is the result of a couple of things: My growing desire to build something A need for a platform to put my thoughts and learnings out Inspiration from Manan Agarwal , a senior of mine at college My plans for this place are simple: to keep adding posts about what I learn and hopefully, add some value to anyone interested in design!

item.title: About Me
item.description: “The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.” – Michel Legrand I’m Arvin Das, a 20 yo currently living in Hyderabad, India. By day, I’m a third year Mechatronics undergrad at MIT, Manipal. By night, I’m a sucker for great design, minimalism, productivity and growth. On the weekends, you’ll find me rooting for Red Bull Racing. Since the start of 2021, I’ve developed a deep interest in building products.
